title: Stardust - League of Legends Cinematic Montage

embed.description: An elegant blend of the more recent League of Legends cinematics. Please like and subscribe to my channel. if you have any suggestions fro music to use for my next video please link me. Finding music for videos is cancerous so plz help. Song: T & Sugah x NCT - Stardust (feat.

body: Plz tell me what you think and if you like it subscribe to my channel thanks

replies.body: i liked it, I am currently studying film in uni and this is put together at a pretty good standard. Maybe consider using a different font for the lyrics on screen and perhaps some sort of fade or blend effect on them so they are not so harsh also maybe try mashing up the song you used (which i do like that song) with some sounds from the cinematic's such as when you transitioned into jinx from the 'get jinxed video' a drop in the song was the perfect opportunity to use the sound effect of the bullets hitting the ground, just my two cents but i really did like what you put together
thank you i will try some of that on my next video
Nice montage collab, in my personal opinion I didn't like the song
finding music for montages is the hardest thing since everyone likes different things
Good montage, song is a bit annoying, probably just me though.
